mention.text: the brutal beating of a Southern California man
the black community here reacted with more of a
spokesman who grew up in the community
King , lifting his hospital garb to show other marks , a large bruise on his chest
King , who had been released from jail in December after serving 21/2 years on a second-degree robbery conviction.
The 10 officers involved in the beating
Los Angeles when several Los Angeles police officers `` jumped into the mess
Los Angeles Police Chief Daryl Gates
things we want to look at
One of the CHP officers at the scene
a plumber who was awakened about 12:30 a.m. Sunday by the sound of police helicopters overhead
Zev Yaroslavsky , a councilman who has requested public hearings on brutality throughout the city
a councilman who has requested public hearings on brutality throughout the city
The perception that non-Anglos are the targets of police brutality
businessman and former Laker Jamaal Wilkes
